name: Hyper Blocks
description:
Hyper Blocks is a simple block puzzle game, simple, fun and addictive for all players from different ages. Your main goal is to create a complete line in horizontal or vertical to clear shapes as many as you can. The more you explode, more score you get. When there are no place to spot shapes, the game will be over. Decide which spot is the best for your shapes. Casual game that you wish to play in your free time.  

No learning curve at all, drag shapes to best spot and complete a line.
